backend/main.mo: Main canister actor defining admin access codes, access control state, storage mixins, and numerous domain maps and ID counters for users, products, orders, artifacts, and logs.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report mapping feature IDs to related frontend files, components, and test IDs.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries of multiple frontend files including pages, hooks, components, and documentation.
frontend/docs/data-architecture.md: Documentation describing the frontend-visible auth model, role system, first-admin bootstrap flow, and React Query–based data persistence.
frontend/docs/design-direction.md: Design specification detailing the dark‑fantasy theme, color system, typography, spacing, and interaction patterns.
frontend/docs/local-storage-strategy.md: Documentation outlining local storage categories, canister-backed data, React Query invalidation, and offline support behavior.
frontend/docs/phase1-features-by-page.md: Lists Phase 1 skeleton features and future enhancements for each site page, covering structure and planned interactions.
frontend/docs/phase1-planning.md: Outlines high-level project architecture, sitemap, access levels, and Phase 1 feature scope for the web app.
frontend/docs/phase6-qa-test-plan.md: Provides manual QA test cases for authentication, role-based access, and shop functionality across devices and browsers.
Describes iteration workflow, offline-first feedback system, and admin review process with technical details and hooks.
frontend/docs/production-deployment.md: Covers deployment steps for backend and frontend, including IC deployment, hosting options, environment variables, and upgrades.
frontend/index.css: Defines Tailwind base layers and CSS variables for light and dark themes including color tokens and layout styles.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point setting up metadata, root div, and loading the main frontend script.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Sets up the React app with TanStack Router, lazy‑loaded pages, and React Query configuration.
frontend/src/components/about/TeamSectio: Renders a team showcase using flip cards with member bios and expertise.
frontend/src/components/about/TimelineSe: Displays a vertical timeline of company milestones with styled cards and icons.
frontend/src/components/admin/AdminAcces: Provides a form to view and update the configurable admin access code with validation and status alerts.
frontend/src/components/admin/AdminAnaly: Wraps and displays the analytics snapshot section inside a simple tab layout.
frontend/src/components/admin/AdminCoupo: Manages coupon creation, validity toggling, and sending coupons to customers, including validation and API hooks.
frontend/src/components/admin/AdminFeedb: Fetches and displays user feedback with search and category filters, including loading and error states.
frontend/src/components/admin/AdminMessa: Provides an admin UI to view inbox items, validate customer principals, send messages, and refresh the inbox.
frontend/src/components/admin/AdminOrder: Displays all orders with filters and opens a tracking detail modal for selected orders.
Modal for updating order tracking status, adding location updates, and adding customer-facing notes.
frontend/src/components/admin/AdminPermi: Checks admin permissions and conditionally renders children or an access-denied alert.
frontend/src/components/admin/AdminProdu: Admin interface for viewing, searching, and managing products with loading and error handling.
frontend/src/components/admin/AdminReque: Modal for approving, declining, messaging, sending coupons, and converting customer requests to orders.
Displays and filters user requests, loads request details, and opens a modal for detailed viewing with status badges.
frontend/src/components/admin/AdminSyste: Shows system health, logs, events, and admin tools with refresh controls and several management subsections.
frontend/src/components/admin/AdminTesti: Lists, filters, and approves user testimonies with basic media indicators and loading/error states.
frontend/src/components/admin/AdminUsers: Displays and filters registered admins, showing permissions, ownership, and basic profile details.
frontend/src/components/admin/BackupReco: Handles viewing backup metadata, creating backups, and restoring from backups with confirmation dialogs and status feedback.
frontend/src/components/admin/MessageAtt: UI component for selecting, validating, uploading, tracking progress, and removing file attachments up to 800MB.
frontend/src/components/adminDashboard/A: Layout wrapper providing top bar, sidebar navigation, and content area for admin dashboard pages.
Sidebar navigation listing dashboard sections with active state handling and logout support.
Top bar showing quick-create menu, notifications count, and profile button with navigation triggers.
frontend/src/components/adminDashboard/v: Dashboard home view showing stats, quick actions, recent data, and links to other admin sections.
Form for uploading new portfolio items with file size validation and basic metadata inputs.
Security settings UI for viewing logs and updating the configurable admin access code with validation.
frontend/src/components/adminplus/AdminP: UI section for validating a principal and setting a new admin password using a mutation.
frontend/src/components/adminplus/AdminR: Displays admin list with controls to promote, demote, and toggle permissions using backend mutations.
frontend/src/components/adminplus/Advanc: Provides controls to toggle shop-wide activation, override product prices, and change product visibility.
frontend/src/components/adminplus/Analyt: Fetches and displays analytics metrics with a manual refresh option and loading/error states.
frontend/src/components/adminplus/Coupon: Global switch to enable or disable all coupon usage with status indicators and explanations.
frontend/src/components/auth/LoginButton: Login/logout button managing Internet Identity authentication, session clearing, and UI states.
frontend/src/components/auth/ProfileSetu: Form for users to enter name and email and save their profile before continuing.
frontend/src/components/auth/RequireAdmi: Wrapper enforcing Internet Identity login and admin role before rendering children, with UI for denied or unauthenticated states.
Gate that redirects admins to an access code screen if master admin access is not unlocked.
frontend/src/components/auth/RequireAuth: Ensures user is authenticated via Internet Identity before showing protected content.
frontend/src/components/auth/RequireOwne: Checks Internet Identity login and confirms caller is owner before granting access, otherwise shows denial screens.
frontend/src/components/contact/ContactP: Displays a list of FAQ items using an accordion component.
frontend/src/components/dashboard/GuildO: Empty placeholder file for a guild orders dashboard panel.
frontend/src/components/dashboard/Invent: Empty placeholder file for an inventory dashboard panel.
frontend/src/components/dashboard/OrderT: Shows detailed order tracking info including current status, next status preview, notes, and location updates.
frontend/src/components/effects/FadeInSe: Fade‑in viewport animation wrapper with reduced‑motion support.
frontend/src/components/effects/FlipCard: Interactive flip card component with keyboard support and reduced‑motion handling.
frontend/src/components/effects/Parallax: Parallax scroll effect component using requestAnimationFrame with reduced‑motion fallback.
frontend/src/components/feedback/Feedbac: Empty placeholder file for a feedback dialog component.
Empty placeholder file for a feedback launcher component.
frontend/src/components/home/Announcemen: Renders a list of announcement cards with titles, dates, badges, and descriptions.
frontend/src/components/home/FeaturedCar: Carousel component cycling through featured items with navigation buttons and indicators.
frontend/src/components/home/QuickLinksG: Grid of navigational cards linking to key site sections with icons and descriptions.
frontend/src/components/layout/AppLayout: Main app layout with background layers, header, footer, random quotes, routed content, and analytics.
frontend/src/components/layout/Footer.ts: Footer with site info, navigation links, legal links, and a dynamic copyright bar.
frontend/src/components/layout/HeaderNav: Responsive header navigation with auth-aware admin link handling and mobile menu logic.
frontend/src/components/layout/PageLayou: Simple page wrapper rendering optional title/description and main content area.
frontend/src/components/portfolio/Portfo: Empty placeholder file for a portfolio details modal component.
Empty placeholder file for a portfolio widget section component.
frontend/src/components/quotes/RandomQuo: Displays several random quotes using a custom hook, updated on page navigation.
frontend/src/components/requests/Request: Media picker supporting image/video validation, preview, upload progress, and removal.
frontend/src/components/services/Service: Renders an accordion listing service offerings with icons, summaries, and expandable detailed descriptions.
frontend/src/components/shop/ProductDeta: Displays a modal with full product details, availability info, price, and add‑to‑cart functionality.
frontend/src/components/shop/ProductFlip: Shows a flip-style product card with image, price, short details, and a button to view full details.
frontend/src/components/shop/ShopCartDra: Implements a slide-out cart drawer supporting item management, coupons, totals, and checkout flow.
frontend/src/components/shop/useShopFilt: Provides search, stock filtering, and sorting logic for product lists using React state and memoization.
frontend/src/components/system/Analytics: Tracks page views on initial load and route changes using a router subscription.
frontend/src/components/system/AppErrorB: A top-level error boundary that logs errors and displays a recovery UI with reload options.
frontend/src/components/system/ErrorStat: Displays an error message or offline notice with optional retry support.
frontend/src/components/system/OfflineSy: Empty placeholder file for an offline sync queue dialog.
Empty placeholder file for offline sync status UI.
frontend/src/components/system/Troublesh: Displays and clears local error logs with timestamps, stack traces, and a confirmation dialog.
frontend/src/components/testimonies/Crea: Form dialog for submitting a testimony with rating, description, photos, and videos, including validation and API submission.
frontend/src/components/testimonies/Half: Interactive half-star rating input supporting hover previews and precise selection.
frontend/src/components/testimonies/Star: Read-only star rating display that supports half-star visuals.
frontend/src/components/testimonies/Test: Flip-card component showing a photo or video preview on the front and description on the back, with hover video playback.
Picker for uploading and validating photo and video files, generating previews, and tracking upload progress.
frontend/src/components/testimonies/useH: Hook that auto-plays or pauses a video based on hover and flip state.
frontend/src/data/quotes.ts: Exports a list of themed quotes for random display across pages.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages an authenticated or anonymous backend actor and refreshes dependent queries when it changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useAdminCoupons.ts: React Query hooks for fetching, creating, toggling, and sending coupons, currently using placeholder logic.
frontend/src/hooks/useAdminMessaging.ts: Provides React Query hooks for fetching an empty admin inbox and sending admin messages, invalidating related queries on success.
frontend/src/hooks/useAdminNotifications: Fetches admin notification counts from the actor with fallback to zeros and auto-refetching.
frontend/src/hooks/useBackupRecovery.ts: Provides hooks to fetch backup metadata, create a backup, and restore from backup while invalidating affected caches.
frontend/src/hooks/useGlobalErrorCapture: Registers global error and promise rejection listeners to log sanitized error data.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides context and hooks for Internet Identity login, logout, identity loading, and status tracking.
frontend/src/hooks/useInView.ts: Implements an IntersectionObserver-based hook to detect when an element enters the viewport.
frontend/src/hooks/useLocalCart.ts: Manages a persistent local cart with add, remove, update, clear, and count helpers stored in localStorage.
frontend/src/hooks/useOfflineDrafts.ts: Stores, retrieves, and expires offline form drafts per form ID using localStorage.
frontend/src/hooks/useOnlineStatus.ts: Tracks online/offline browser status via event listeners.
frontend/src/hooks/usePrefersReducedMoti: Detects the user's reduced-motion preference with cross-browser support.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Collection of React Query hooks for profiles, roles, permissions, admin access, and related actor calls.
frontend/src/hooks/useRandomQuotes.ts: Returns a stable set of random quotes that regenerate on route changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useRecentlyViewed.ts: Manages a list of recently viewed products with add, clear, and localStorage persistence logic.
frontend/src/hooks/useSearchArtifacts.ts: Provides a React Query hook to search artifacts via an actor, currently returning empty results until backend search is implemented.
frontend/src/hooks/useSessionState.ts: Maintains session-scoped state with automatic persistence and expiration via localStorage.
frontend/src/hooks/useSystemSettings.ts: Exposes several React Query hooks for fetching system health, logs, events, and admin activity from the backend actor.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines global typography, color variables, dark mode styles, Tailwind layers, and UI utility animations.
frontend/src/lib/adminAccessSession.ts: Handles session-scoped admin access unlock state using sessionStorage.
frontend/src/lib/adminEntryLockout.ts: Manages persistent admin lockout state per principal using localStorage with versioned keys.
frontend/src/lib/analytics.ts: Implements configurable analytics with first-party logging or Google Analytics integration and event/pageview tracking.
frontend/src/lib/authorizationErrors.ts: Normalizes and detects authorization-related errors for consistent user messaging.
frontend/src/lib/clientDetails.ts: Extracts browser and device information from the user agent for logging and security purposes.
frontend/src/lib/errorLogging.ts: Provides client-side error logging to localStorage with sanitization, size limits, and helper utilities.
frontend/src/lib/localStorage.ts: Utility for versioned, expiring, and safely handled localStorage reads and writes, including cleanup helpers.
frontend/src/lib/offlineMutationQueue.ts: Manages a persistent offline mutation queue with enqueue, update, failure tracking, and clearing functions.
frontend/src/lib/randomQuotes.ts: Selects 2–3 non-repeating random quotes from a predefined list.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Initializes React root and wraps the app with React Query and Internet Identity providers.
frontend/src/pages/About.tsx: Renders the About page with creator bio, mission, and vision content using styled sections and animations.
frontend/src/pages/Admin.tsx: Admin dashboard router that loads different admin views based on active section with access gating.
frontend/src/pages/AdminAccess.tsx: Handles admin access code entry with lockout logic, backend verification, and redirect on success.
frontend/src/pages/AdminPlus.tsx: Owner-only advanced admin panel providing analytics, shop controls, coupon manager, admin registry, and password tools.
frontend/src/pages/BlogLore.tsx: Renders a lore-themed blog list with cards, categories, dates, and read times using animated sections.
frontend/src/pages/Contact.tsx: Provides a contact form with validation, simulated submission, and social/contact info sections.
frontend/src/pages/Dashboard.tsx: Displays user profile setup, orders, and products with tabs, loading states, and profile-saving logic.
frontend/src/pages/FAQ.tsx: Shows searchable FAQ items grouped by category with an accordion UI.
frontend/src/pages/Homepage.tsx: Builds the homepage with a hero section, featured carousel, quick links, and promotional feature cards.
frontend/src/pages/Inbox.tsx: Fetches and displays user inbox messages with loading, error handling, refresh, and mark‑as‑read actions.
frontend/src/pages/Portfolio.tsx: Displays a portfolio page with category filters and placeholder states for empty or loading items.
frontend/src/pages/Privacy.tsx: Renders a static privacy policy with multiple sections inside a styled card layout.
frontend/src/pages/SearchArtifacts.tsx: Provides a searchable and filterable interface for artifacts using a search hook and category selection.
frontend/src/pages/Services.tsx: Shows a list of services with an accordion and links for submitting custom requests or contacting support.
frontend/src/pages/Shop.tsx: Implements a product shop with filtering, view modes, cart drawer, and handling for loading, errors, and shop availability.
frontend/src/pages/SubmitRequest.tsx: Contains a protected form for submitting custom project requests, prefilled with user data and supporting media uploads.
frontend/src/pages/Terms.tsx: Renders the Terms of Service page using card sections and layout components with static legal text.
frontend/src/pages/Testimonies.tsx: Displays customer testimonies with star ratings and media cards, including creation dialog and loading/error states.
frontend/src/types/adminMessaging.ts: Empty placeholder file for future admin messaging types.
frontend/src/types/common.ts: Defines shared product-related types including visibility, availability, and product structure.
frontend/src/types/orderTracking.ts: Provides order tracking types, status helpers, and formatting utilities for timestamps.
frontend/src/types/phase5a.ts: Contains Phase 5A request and testimony types with media definitions and pricing preferences.
frontend/src/types/phase5b.ts: Defines Phase 5B request, inbox, and messaging types including statuses, attachments, and summaries.
frontend/src/utils/mediaValidation.ts: Implements media validation utilities for file size, duration, description length, and file-type checks.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility functions for reading, storing, and clearing URL and session parameters.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration extending theme colors, fonts, animations, and plugin setup.
project_state.json: Defines project requirements to implement and recognize a permanent master admin code '7583A' that always grants access and redirects to the Admin Dashboard. Lists existing features, new feature requests, and architectural notes related to validating and presenting this master code.
